questions.question: I have …………………………….. twelve eggs.
questions.description: Bought is the past participle form of buy.

questions.question: Have you ………………………….. the violin?
questions.description: Brought is the past participle form of bring.

questions.question: He ………………………….. there motionless.
questions.description: Lay is the past tense of lie.

questions.question: Much water has …………………………. under the bridge.
questions.description: Flowed is the past participle of flow.

questions.question: Suddenly he ………………………….. from his seat.
questions.description: Rose is the past participle of rise.

questions.question: The injured person was ………………………………. to hospital.
questions.description: Taken is the past participle of take.

questions.question: He …………………………… a black shirt.
questions.description: Wore is the past tense of wear.

questions.question: She …………………………. her hand.
questions.description: Rise is intransitive. Raise is transitive. Raised is the past simple form of raise.

questions.question: The ship ………………………….. to the bottom.
questions.description: Sank is the past simple form of sink.

questions.question: The bell has ……………………………..
questions.description: Rung is the past participle form of ring.
